metadata.name: Ceramic Token Raffle #001: Elastic Sour
metadata.description:
Used in conjunction with the Ceramic Token Raffle hosted by Pam Su Ceramics Digital Kiln. 
Part of Marble Monument Design.

This token is equal to one entry in the Ceramic Token Raffle #001: Elastic Sour.

 **Ceramic Token Raffle**

This is an opportunity for ANYONE to get a chance at owning the physical artwork of Pam Su Ceramics!  
 
Limited Number of Tokens per raffle. (Supply will vary for each ceramic)  
 
With any raffle, the more tokens purchased, better chance of winning. 

However, it is RANDOMLY chosen from holders wallets, so anyone who purchases a token will be entered. 

Snapshot of Holder wallets will be taken 24 hours after all tokens have been minted.

Winner drawn 24 hours after snapshot.

Physical Ceramic will be processed for shipping within 72 hours of winner confirmation. Please give at least 5-7 business days for tracking (tracking will be supplied once item is crated and shipped.)  
 
**2 BURN 1 EARN**

After each winning confirmation, remaining tokens can be burned at 2 for 1. Burn 2 tokens and receive 1 token that counts towards the next raffle! 

**Burn page will be open for 12 HOURS ONLY. **

  ** All tokens must be sold before a winner can be drawn. **
